cards.name: Gurimon
cards.effect2: [Your Turn] While you have 2 or more Digimon in play, this Digimon gets +1000 DP.
ruling: Q: Does this card's inherited effect also count the Digimon on top of this card?
A: Yes, it is counted.
Q: Will the Digimon with this card's inherited effect get +2000 DP if I have 4 Digimon in play?
A: No, it does not. It will only have +1000 DP from this effect.

cards.name: Solarmon
cards.effect1: [All Turns] Players can't reduce play costs.
ruling: Q: What kind of effect is this card's "can't reduce play costs."?

A: It is an effect that nullifies "reduce memory cost by x". You and your opponent will be unable to activate effects that reduce play costs, and must pay the play cost written on the cards in order to play them.
Q: When this Digimon is in play, can "play without paying its memory cost" effects activate?
A: Yes, "play without paying its memory cost" is not an effect that reduces play costs, so it can activate.

cards.name: Huckmon
cards.effect1: [Your Turn] (Once Per Turn) When you play a Digimon with [Sistermon] in its name, gain 1 memory.
cards.effect2: [All Turns] While this Digimon has [Huckmon] in its name or [Royal Knight] in its traits, it gets +1000 DP.
ruling: Q: If an effect plays 2 or more Digimon with [Sistermon] in their name, will this Digimon gain 1 memory for each Digimon that is played?
A: No, it will only gain 1 memory when 2 or more Digimon with [Sistermon] in their name are played at the same time.

cards.name: BaoHuckmon
cards.effect2: [All Turns] While this Digimon has [Huckmon] in its name or [Royal Knight] in its traits, it gets +1000 DP.

cards.name: SaviorHuckmon
cards.effect1: [When Digivolving] This Digimon may also attack your opponent's unsuspended Digimon for the turn.
cards.effect2: [When Attacking] (Once Per Turn) If this Digimon has [Royal Knight] in its traits, you may play 1 Digimon card with [Sistermon] in its name from your hand or trash without paying its memory cost.

cards.name: Volcanomon
cards.effect1: <Blocker> (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead).
cards.effect2: <Security Attack +1> (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card).

cards.name: Jesmon
cards.effect1:
[When Digivolving] <Blitz> (If your opponent has 1 or more memory, this Digimon may attack)
[When Attacking] You may play 1 Digimon card with [Sistermon] in its name from your hand without paying its memory cost.
[Your Turn] (Once Per Turn) When you play another Digimon by an effect, this Digimon gets +3000 DP and gains <Security Attack +1> (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card) for the turn.
ruling: Q: If this Digimon plays a Digimon card with [Sistermon] in its name with its [When Attacking] effect, will this Digimon have +3000 DP and <Security Attack +1> during the attack?
A: Yes, it will.

cards.name: Gankoomon
cards.effect1:
[When Digivolving] You may play 1 [Huckmon] or 1 Digimon card with [Sistermon] in its name in your trash without paying its memory cost.
[Your Turn] (Once Per Turn) When one of your effects plays another Digimon, <De-Digivolve  1> on 2 of your opponent's Digimon (Trash up to 1 card from the top of one of your opponent's Digimon. If it has no digivolution cards, or becomes a level 3 Digimon, you can't trash any more cards).

cards.name: Sistermon Blanc
cards.jpname: シスタモン ブラン
cards.effect1:
[On Play] By trashing 1 card in your hand, <Draw 2> (Draw 2 cards from your deck).
[All Turns] While you have a Digimon in play with [Huckmon] in its name or [Royal Knight] in its traits, this Digimon gains <Decoy (Red/Black)> (When one of your other red or black Digimon would be deleted by an opponent's effect, you may delete this Digimon to prevent that deletion).
ruling: Q: Is it possible not to activate this card's [On Play]?
A: Yes, it is an optional effect so you can choose not to trash 1 card in your hand. In which case, you will not <Draw 2>.

cards.name: Sistermon Noir
cards.jpname: シスタモン ノワール
cards.effect1:
[On Play] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [Huckmon] in its name or [Royal Knight] in its traits among them to your hand. Trash the rest.
[All Turns] All of your Digimon with [Huckmon] in their names and [Royal Knight] in their traits gain <Reboot> (Unsuspend this Digimon during your opponent's unsuspend phase).
ruling: Q: If this card is in the hand or breeding area. Is this card still treated as "[Sistermon Ciel] and [Data] Attribute"?
A: Yes, it is treated as "[Sistermon Ciel] and [Data] Attribute" because it is a special rule and not an effect.
Q: Does this card have four traits, [Champion], [Puppet], [Virus], and [Data]?
A: Yes, this card is treated as both [Virus] and [Data], but it is treated as one card number, and it is treated as having three traits in total including [Champion] and [Puppet].

cards.name: Aus Generics
cards.effect1: [Main] 1 of your Digimon gets +2000 DP for the turn. Then, if you have a Digimon with [Huckmon] in its name or [Royal Knight] in its traits in play, gain 1 memory , and 1 of your Digimon gains <Piercing> (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would) for the turn.
cards.effect2: [Security] Gain 1 memory, and add this card to its owner's hand.
ruling: Q: Is it possible to give the +2000 DP effect and <Piercing> effect to different Digimon?
A: Yes, you can target different Digimon for each effect, and it can also be the same Digimon.

cards.name: From Master to Disciple
cards.effect1:
[Main] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [Huckmon] or [Sistermon] in its name or [Royal Knight] in its traits among them to your hand. Trash the rest. Then, place this card in your Battle Area.
[Main] <Delay> (Trash this card in your battle area to activate the effect below. You can't activate this effect the turn this card enters play.)
・The next time one of your Digimon would digivolve this turn, reduce the digivolution cost by 1.
cards.effect2: [Security] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [Huckmon] or [Sistermon] in its name or [Royal Knight] in its traits among them to your hand. Trash the rest. Then, place this card in your battle area.
ruling: Q: If this card does not reveal any cards with [Huckmon] or [Sistermon] in its name, or [Royal Knight] in its traits. Does this card still place itself in the battle area?
A: Yes, regardless of the cards that were revealed, this card will be placed in the battle area after trashing the revealed cards.

cards.name: Quake! Blast! Fire! Father!
cards.effect1:
While you have a Digimon with [Huckmon] or [Sistermon] in its name or [Royal Knight] in its traits in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements.
[Main] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with a play cost of 13 or less.
